Text:
I can't seem to get this to work. I've tried playing it in VLC and in Splash Lite.

In VLC, the audio and subtitles will work fine, but the video is just a blank green screen (outside of the subtitles).

In Splash, it won't even play.

Any help?

If you're curious which download link you need to click, it's CCCP and not Insurgent to get this to work.

God forbid the poster can help people.
@xhizors: This did the trick for me, thank you! VLC still showed a green screen but it works perfectly when I use the mediaplayer included in the download.
Yeah that worked for me too. Shame it's named what it is and has some commie propaganda. But it works so whatever.
hi, when will the second part be out ?
The second one, The Capture of Doldrey, has already been released in Japan.
